recipes.name: Waffles
steps: In a bowl, whisk together dry ingredients.
Add eggs, milk, melted butter, and vanilla. Mix until smooth.
Preheat the waffle iron and grease it.
Pour batter onto the waffle iron and cook until golden brown.
Serve with syrup and toppings.

recipes.name: Hot Chocolate
steps: In a small pot, heat milk over medium heat.
Whisk in cocoa powder and sugar until dissolved.
Bring to a simmer and remove from heat.
Stir in vanilla extract.
Top with whipped cream and serve.

recipes.name: Pancakes
steps: Mix dry ingredients in one bowl.
In another bowl, whisk together wet ingredients.
Combine wet and dry ingredients, stirring until smooth.
Heat a non-stick skillet and grease lightly.
Pour batter into the pan and cook until bubbles form.
Flip and cook until golden brown.

recipes.name: Donuts
steps: Preheat oil for frying.
Mix dry ingredients in one bowl.
Whisk eggs, milk, melted butter, and vanilla in another.
Combine wet and dry ingredients until smooth.
Shape dough and fry in batches.
Cool and coat with sugar or glaze.

recipes.name: Cereal
steps: Pour cereal into a bowl.
Add milk and serve.

recipes.name: Cookies
steps: Preheat the oven to 175Â°C.
Cream butter and sugar together.
Add egg and vanilla, mix well.
Stir in flour and baking soda.
Shape dough into balls and place on a baking sheet.
Bake for 10-12 minutes until golden.
